target.rawSql:
SELECT
  setting::timestamptz as time,
  'postmaster started' as text
FROM sample_settings 
WHERE 
  server_id = $profile_servers AND
  name = 'pg_postmaster_start_time' AND 
  setting::timestamptz BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT
  setting::timestamptz as time,
  'configuration loaded' as text
FROM sample_settings 
WHERE 
  server_id = $profile_servers AND
  name = 'pg_conf_load_time' AND 
  setting::timestamptz BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.description: Use provided pg_profile function call to get report of observable interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time < '${__from:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id DESC
  LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time > '${__from:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id ASC
  LIMIT 1)
) as StartID

SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time < '${__to:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id DESC
  LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time > '${__to:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id ASC
  LIMIT 1)
) as StartID

panels.title: Report generation

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  reset_val
FROM settings_and_changes($profile_servers, $startid, $endid)
WHERE name = 'version'
ORDER BY first_seen ASC

panels.description: LSN and pg_stat_archiver increment

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(wal_size) as "Bytes",
  sum(archived_count) as "Archived",
  sum(failed_count) as "Archive failed"
FROM sample_stat_cluster sc JOIN sample_stat_archiver sa USING (server_id, sample_id)
WHERE
  sc.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid

panels.title: WAL

panels.description: Summary pg_stat_statements  extension data

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (coalesce(sum(total_plan_time), 0) + sum(total_exec_time)) / 1000 as "Elapsed (s)",
  (sum(blk_read_time) + sum(blk_write_time)) / 1000 as "I/O time (s)"
FROM sample_statements_total sst
WHERE
  sst.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid

panels.title: Overall statement times

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(blks_hit) * 100 / nullif(sum(blks_hit) + sum(blks_read), 0)
FROM sample_stat_database sd
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND sample_id BETWEEN $startid  + 1 AND $endid

panels.description: Summary transaction data from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(temp_files) as "Files",
  sum(temp_bytes) as "Size"
FROM sample_stat_database sc
WHERE
  sc.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid

panels.title: Temporary files

panels.description: Summary transaction data from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(xact_commit) as "Commit",
  sum(xact_rollback) as "Rollback",
  sum(deadlocks) as "Deadlocks"
FROM sample_stat_database sc
WHERE
  sc.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid

panels.title: Transactions

panels.description: Commit rate data from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(xact_rollback) / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as "Rollbacks",
  sum(xact_commit) / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as "Commits"
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Transactions

panels.description: Sum of cluster database sizes

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(sd.datsize)
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND sd.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid 
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cluster size

panels.description: Commit rate data from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(xact_commit) / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as commits_ps
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cluster commits

panels.description: Rollback rate data from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(xact_rollback) / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as rollback_ps
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cluster rollbacks

panels.description: Cluster session statistics from pg_stat_database. Available since Postgres 14

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(sessions) / extract(epoch from min(smpe.sample_time) - min(smps.sample_time)) as sessions,
  sum(sessions_abandoned) / extract(epoch from min(smpe.sample_time) - min(smps.sample_time)) as sessions_abandoned,
  sum(sessions_fatal) / extract(epoch from min(smpe.sample_time) - min(smps.sample_time)) as sessions_fatal,
  sum(sessions_killed) / extract(epoch from min(smpe.sample_time) - min(smps.sample_time)) as sessions_killed
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Sessions

panels.description: Cluster session timing statistics from pg_stat_database. Available since Postgres 14

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(session_time) / 1000 / extract(epoch from min(smpe.sample_time) - min(smps.sample_time)) as session_time,
  sum(active_time) / 1000  / extract(epoch from min(smpe.sample_time) - min(smps.sample_time)) as active_time,
  sum(idle_in_transaction_time) / 1000  / extract(epoch from min(smpe.sample_time) - min(smps.sample_time)) as idle_in_transaction_time
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Session times

panels.description: Buffers write rate from pg_stat_bgwriter view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  buffers_clean / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as bgwriter,
  buffers_checkpoint / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as checkpointer,
  buffers_backend / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as backends
FROM sample_stat_cluster sc JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sc.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
ORDER BY  time

panels.title: Write

panels.description: Time spent writing buffers from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(blk_write_time) / 1000 / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as write_sps
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cluster write time

panels.description: Read rate from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(blks_read) / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as read
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cluster reads

panels.description: Time spent reading buffers from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(blk_read_time) / 1000 / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as read_sps
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cluster read time

panels.description: Buffer hits rate from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(blks_hit) / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as hit
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cluster hits

panels.description: Hit ratio (calculated on pg_stat_database data)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(blks_hit) * 100 / 
  NULLIF(sum(blks_hit) + sum(blks_read), 0) as hit_pct
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Hit ratio

panels.description: LSN increment and wal_bytes summary of pg_stat_statements

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  wal_size / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as "Cluster WAL"
FROM sample_stat_cluster sc 
  JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sc.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND $__timeFilter(smpe.sample_time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(wal_bytes) / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as "Statements WAL"
FROM sample_statements_total sst 
  JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sst.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND $__timeFilter(smpe.sample_time)
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: WAL

panels.description: Based on pg_stat_archiver view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  archived_count * 60 / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as archived,
  failed_count * 60 / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as failed
FROM sample_stat_archiver sa JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sa.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND $__timeFilter(smpe.sample_time)
ORDER BY time

panels.title: WAL Archiving

panels.description: WAL records rate from pg_stat_wal view. Available since Postgres 14

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  wal_records / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as wrps
FROM sample_stat_wal sw JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sw.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
ORDER BY time

panels.title: WAL records

panels.description: WAL FPI rate from pg_stat_wal view. Available since Postgres 14

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  wal_fpi / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as fpips
FROM sample_stat_wal sw JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sw.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
ORDER BY time

panels.title: WAL full page images

panels.description: WAL write and sync rate from pg_stat_wal view. Available since Postgres 14

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  wal_write / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as "Writes per second",
  wal_sync / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as "Syncs per second"
FROM sample_stat_wal sw JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sw.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
ORDER BY time

panels.title: WAL write and sync

panels.description: WAL write and sync time elapsed from pg_stat_wal view. Available since Postgres 14 if track_wal_io_timing setting is on.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  wal_write_time / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as "Write time per second (s/s)",
  wal_sync_time / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as "Syncs time per second (s/s)"
FROM sample_stat_wal sw JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sw.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
ORDER BY time

panels.title: WAL write and sync time

panels.description: Temporary size rate from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(temp_bytes) / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as temp_bytes_ps
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Temp files size

panels.description: Temporary files generation rate from pg_stat_database view

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(temp_files) / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time) as temp_files_ps
FROM sample_stat_database sd JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sd.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND NOT datistemplate
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY smpe.sample_time, smps.sample_time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cluster temp files generation rate

panels.description: Times spent by statements on planning, execution, reading and writing from pg_stat_statements

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(total_plan_time / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time))/1000 as "Planning",
  sum(total_exec_time / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time))/1000 as "Execution",
  sum(sst.blk_read_time / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time))/1000 as "Read",
  sum(sst.blk_write_time / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time))/1000 as "Write"
FROM sample_statements_total sst
  JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sst.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Statement time

panels.description: Planning and executions count from pg_stat_statements

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(calls / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time)) as "Executions",
  sum(plans / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time)) as "Plans"
FROM sample_statements_total sst
  JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sst.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Statement plans/executions

panels.description: Temp blocks read and write rate from pg_stat_statements

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(temp_blks_read / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time)) as "Temp read",
  sum(temp_blks_written / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time)) as "Temp written"
FROM sample_statements_total sst
  JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sst.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Statement temp I/O

panels.description: Shared blocks read and write rate from pg_stat_statements

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(shared_blks_read / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time)) as "Shared read",
  sum(shared_blks_written / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time)) as "Shared written"
FROM sample_statements_total sst
  JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sst.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Statement shared I/O

panels.description: Local blocks read and write rate from pg_stat_statements

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  sum(local_blks_read / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time)) as "Local read",
  sum(local_blks_written / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time)) as "Local written"
FROM sample_statements_total sst
  JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  sst.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Statement local I/O

panels.description: Time waited in each wait event type per second from pg_wait_sampling extension (for waits with queryid)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  wst.event_type as wet,
  sum(stmt_waited / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time))/1000 as "Waited"
FROM wait_sampling_total wst
  JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  wst.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY time, wst.event_type
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Wait event types (statements)

panels.description: Time waited in each wait event type per second from pg_wait_sampling extension (for all waits)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  smpe.sample_time as time,
  wst.event_type as wet,
  sum(tot_waited / extract(epoch from smpe.sample_time - smps.sample_time))/1000 as "Waited"
FROM wait_sampling_total wst
  JOIN samples smpe USING (server_id, sample_id)
  JOIN samples smps ON (smpe.server_id, smpe.sample_id -1) = (smps.server_id, smps.sample_id)
WHERE
  wst.server_id = ${profile_servers}
  AND smpe.sample_id BETWEEN $startid + 1 AND $endid
GROUP BY time, wst.event_type
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Wait event types (all)

list.definition: select server_id as __value, server_name as __text FROM servers
list.label: Server
list.name: profile_servers
list.query: select server_id as __value, server_name as __text FROM servers

list.definition:
SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time < '${__from:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id DESC
  LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time > '${__from:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id ASC
  LIMIT 1)
) as StartID
list.label: StartID
list.name: startid
list.query:
SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time < '${__from:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id DESC
  LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time > '${__from:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id ASC
  LIMIT 1)
) as StartID

list.definition:
SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time < '${__to:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id DESC
  LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time > '${__to:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id ASC
  LIMIT 1)
) as StartID
list.description: Sample identifier of the current range end
list.label: EndID
list.name: endid
list.query:
SELECT COALESCE(
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time < '${__to:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id DESC
  LIMIT 1),
  (SELECT sample_id
  FROM samples
  WHERE
    server_id = $profile_servers AND
    sample_time > '${__to:date:iso}'
  ORDER BY sample_id ASC
  LIMIT 1)
) as StartID

list.definition:
SELECT extract(epoch from min(sample_time))*1000 + 1 as min_from
FROM samples
WHERE
  server_id = $profile_servers
list.description: Minimal time for the current server
list.name: min_from
list.query:
SELECT extract(epoch from min(sample_time))*1000 + 1 as min_from
FROM samples
WHERE
  server_id = $profile_servers

list.definition:
SELECT extract(epoch from max(sample_time))*1000 + 1 as max_to
FROM samples
WHERE
  server_id = $profile_servers
list.description: Maximum time for the current server
list.name: max_to
list.query:
SELECT extract(epoch from max(sample_time))*1000 + 1 as max_to
FROM samples
WHERE
  server_id = $profile_servers
